attributes.action: cameras in special need schools and transport
attributes.additional_details: Please sign and share . There are so many vulnerable children that can't tell us what's going on in their lives .
attributes.background:
I am mum to a 14 year old autistic boy with limited communication who attends a special needs school.
He has on occasions come home from school with marks on him . They have always been explained by the school but cameras would solve the problem
